Posts.Content: justinl428 wrote: Hi there I am extremely worried I have had a tender lump under my right nipple for a couple years now. The nipple has actually went into the skin and it disappeared but the area where the nipple was has discharged blood. There appears to be skin puckering or dimpling and a darker areola so I am wondering if this is breast cancer? I am a 21 year old male and am not very active so shafing would not be accurate. Thanks I have posted a link to some pics Read more atÂ http://www.askthedoctor.com/topics-a-z/228-breast-cancer/139108-blood-discharge-from-nipple-area-tender-lump-dark-areola-with-skin-dimpling-male-breast-cancer.html?sg=MTM5MTA4#ZTvUiZK1CVP5UbPj.99 Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Tender lump, nipple inversion, bloody discharge, dark areola justinl428 SarahsMom
